topics: Sketching of scenes and activities from memory based on urbanscape such as public spaces, markets, festivals, street scenes, and monuments
Sketching of recreational spaces and natural landscapes including riverfronts, jungles, gardens, trees, and plants
Use of perspective, proportions, and scale in freehand drawing
Application of color using color pencils and crayons
Understanding of spatial relationships and depth in composition
note: Candidates are advised to bring pencils, their own geometry box set, crayons, and colour pencils for the Drawing Test.
